## LinearCardContainer.setOrientation() method

Set all cards to the given orientation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOrientation(orientation: CardOrientation): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  orientation | [CardOrientation](./bge-core.cardorientation.md) | Orientation to set the cards to. |
